entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
